item.title: Limited edition spring drinks are being introduced at Starbucks stores in Asia
item.description:
Starbucks is celebrating spring in Asia with a variety of limited-edition drinks, ranging from refreshing iced options to comforting hot beverages. Source: Starbucks. Coconut Water Espresso Shakerato. The Coconut Water Espresso Shakerato blends Starbucks’ espresso with ice, poured over chilled coconut water sweetened with coconut syrup. It’s finished with espresso foam and a lime slice. This beverage is available iced only. Source: Starbucks. New Valencia Orange Cocoa Cappuccino. The New Valencia Orange Cocoa Cappuccino starts with a Valencia orange mocha sauce, layered with steamed milk and espresso shots...

item.title: Starbucks Singapore is launching a special, limited edition alice + olivia design collection
item.description:
Starting January 31, 2015, Starbucks Singapore is offering a limited-edition collection of merchandise designed by Stacey Bendet, the CEO and Creative Director of alice + olivia. The collection incorporates the brand’s signature black-and-white color scheme and the famous ‘Stace Face’ logo, bringing a playful and whimsical touch to Starbucks merchandise. This special collection, which includes a ‘Stace Face’ mug, a reusable designer tote bag, and an alice + olivia Starbucks Rewards Card, is available at the Starbucks ION Orchard location...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/starbucks-singapore-is-launching-a-special-limited-edition-alice-olivia-design-collection/

item.title: Starbucks' festive beverages
item.description:
An advertisement for Starbucks’ holiday beverages at a train station in Singapore. Starbucks has launched its holiday drink menu in participating stores globally. Some of the drinks available in the Asia Pacific region include: Teavana Apple Joyful Medley Tea This new Christmas beverage features a blend of black, oolong, and jasmine green teas, combined with apple juice and topped with cinnamon foam. It’s available hot or iced. Christmas Panettone Latte..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/starbucks-festive-beverages/

item.title: Starbucks and Weixin have collaborated to introduce a new social gifting feature
item.description:
Source Starbucks. Starbucks and Weixin launch a new social gifting feature. Starbucks and Tencent have launched “Say it with Stars,” a new gifting feature on the Chinese social media platform Weixin. This follows their strategic partnership announced in December 2016. This service allows users to send gifts instantly, such as Starbucks beverages or digital gift cards. Belinda Wong, CEO of Starbucks China, stated their goal is to deepen connections between people by allowing them to express feelings like love and gratitude through the act of giving Starbucks...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/starbucks-and-weixin-have-collaborated-to-introduce-a-new-social-gifting-feature/
